attributes.action: Take into public ownership the homes and other assets of all the directors of any bank that has received funding or guarantees from the government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To include property, cash, shares and  pensions funds. 
This action would ensure that our bank directors were given a cruel taste of their own medicine for they would get to experience first-hand the pain and misery of thier homes, and other assets, being repossessed.
I submit this petition as I am tired of seeing tax-payers hard earned cash being poured into the black hole that our country's banking sector has become.
It is time for the directors of our banks to be punished for their past mistakes and for them to be held accountable for the economic catastrophe that they have brought upon us. Bring me sunshine!
